author: Liturgist
body:
Download link appears to be incorrect.

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.0.0-alpha.11/PowerShell_6.0.0.10-alpha.11-win10-x64.msi

Should it be...?

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.0.0-alpha.11/PowerShell_6.0.0.11-alpha.11-win10-x64.msi

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Duplicate issue that was supposed to be corrected:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2500

Now this is confirmed: the link is missing!!
What happened?
:)

title: Download link for Windows 10 .msi incorrect
